Title: To Northshire
Description:
Vanessa's care for her people deserves better than a brotherhood of bandits. I am glad to see them part ways. 

And as spymaster, I'm in no small part relieved.

Now, Northshire. Peasants can become heroes, there. Perhaps your own journey began in that abbey?

It's also a strong, defensible position to attack Stormwind from. We cannot let it fall!

Hurry, to Northshire!
ObjectivesText: Meet Vanessa, Cecilia, and Shaw in Northshire.
